site_name: CarparkPlay Area And GaragesDaniels RoadLondon SE15 3NA
description: Discharge of Schedule 2, Clause S2, 2.1-2.3 (Car Club Scheme) of the S106 Agreement relating to planning permission 16/AP/4003 dated 27/04/2017  (Construction of two 3 storey residential (Use Class C3) blocks with a total of 19 new council homes. Block A comprises of 5x 3 bed houses. Block B comprises of 2x 3 bed flats, 6x 2 bed flats, 4x 1 bed flat, 1x 1 bed wheelchair accessible flat with a dedicated car parking space and 1x 3 bed wheelchair accessible flat with a dedicated car parking space; together with associated communal amenity space, landscaping works, a new 5 space car park and reprovision of playground space). Carpark Play Area And Garages Daniels Road London SE15 3NATo comply with the Car Club Scheme obligation in the Unilateral Undertaking pursuant to S106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 in relation to land known as Carpark Play Area And Garages Daniels Road London SE15 3NA. Discharge of planning obligations schedule 2, clause 2, 2.1 - 2.3 of  S106 agreement  16/AP/4003 Car Club Scheme.
